br.ufrgs.inf.bdi4jade.util.goal

Class CompositeGoal

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrgs.inf.bdi4jade.util.goal.CompositeGoal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Goal, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParallelGoal, SequentialGoal

    public abstract class CompositeGoal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Goal
    This class represents a goal that is a composition of other goals (subgoals). It has two subclasses, which indicate if the goals must be achieved in a parallel or sequential way.
    Author:
    ingrid
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
